modifier.description: If specified, this modifier will apply to the experience gained.
modifier.markdownDescription: If specified, this modifier will apply to the experience gained.

modifiers.description: If specified, these modifiers will apply to the experience gained.
modifiers.markdownDescription: If specified, these modifiers will apply to the experience gained.

type.description:
## Modify XP Gain

---



[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_xp_gain)

Modifies how much XP the player gains when they pick up an experience orb.

Type ID: `origins:modify_xp_gain`



---

### üìù Note

Be careful not to make this go too high, as then the player would be able to gain more experience from dying.






---

### Examples

```json
{
    "type": "origins:modify_xp_gain",
    "modifier": {
        "operation": "multiply_base",
        "value": 2.0
    }
}
```

This example will triple the gained experience from experience orbs.
